explains: n. 罪犯，过失者；问题的起因

sentences.en: Police collared the culprit as he was leaving the premises.
sentences.cn: 罪犯正离开现场时，警察逮住了他。

sentences.en: The police followed home the clue and finally caught the culprit.
sentences.cn: 警察根据线索追根到底，终于抓住了这个罪犯。

sentences.en: The main culprit in the current crisis seems to be modern farming techniques.
sentences.cn: 当前这场危机的罪魁祸首好像是现代农业技术。
